channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2 Fridges dumped close to our loading bay, 23rd January
item.description:
It is next to Gadmon Industries gates on 55-57 Glengall road.

item.title: Base of bed dumped and falling into road, 23rd January
item.description:
A bed base has been dumped here and has been there over a week. This is a common fly tipping area. Please can this be addressed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Birchdene Drive, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 15 inch diameter pothole, a couple of inches deep, 23rd January
item.description:
Pothole is on zebra crossing very close to the slope up onto the pavement. It is a danger to people with mobility or vision issues. It's been there a few weeks but is getting bigger by the day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, The Oval, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass hazard – urgent removal needed, 23rd January
item.description:
Large amount of dumped waste including a wooden pallet, broken mirror/glass, and rubbish bags left outside the front of 87A Beckhenham High street , Br31ag. This appears to be fly-tipping and is a hazard to pedestrians due to broken glass. Please arrange urgent removal and investigate.” This is not our household waste and has been dumped without permission

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Village Way, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes, 23rd January
item.description:
Craters for pot holes all along Petts wood Road to Petts wood and towards poverest! Pot hopes all down leesons hill too - too many to ring! Before long a cyclist or motorcycle will end up in hospital or worse because of the size of these potholes. There is gravel all around them all too making it dangerous for everyone! A chip hitting a passerby. Cars being damaged as hopes bigger than the wheels. This is becoming more disgraceful as the weeks go on and with the continued bad weather a danger to everyone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working., 23rd January
item.description:
The street light outside of Deep Dell is not working, the number on the street lamp is incomplete, one photograph is with my back to the lamp post looking at the 'Y' junction by the tennis courts in the park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Place Park, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
